item.description:
The Women's National Book Association, Boston Chapter is hosting a yankee swap, and one of their head organizers has cordially invited bookcrossers to join them! It's a great opportunity to meet other Boston-area avid readers and to swap books!

If you don't know what a yankee swap is, here are some typical rules: http://mullenclan.com/misc/YankeeSwapRules.htm

Instructions: Bring a single book, new or gently used, that you want to share/give to others, and wrap it up for the yankee swap.

Expert Bookcrossers: Outside of the yankee swap game, we are allowed to bring a few extra books to give away bookcrossing-style, but not as many (as a typical meeting), as you'll be responsible for books that you bring and give away. If any of your books are unclaimed at the end of the evening, you'll need to bring them home, as there will be no place to leave them.

Because of limited space at the venue, I'm capping rsvps at 8; please only rsvp if you are coming. If we have extended interest, I'll check with the organizers to see if they can accommodate.

Website for the WNBA: http://www.wnbaboston.org/events.php
item.how_to_find_us: Bookcrossing group: Please meet on the street in front of the venue. If you come later, come up to the 5th floor
item.name: SPECIAL meetup - Yankee Book Swap - Women's National Book Association Boston
